## DeprecationsServiceStart.resolveDeprecation property

Calls the correctiveActions.api to automatically resolve the depprecation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveDeprecation: <Payload = unknown>(details: DomainDeprecationDetails) => Promise<ResolveDeprecationResponse<Payload>>;
```
